pages.text: $(li)The Elder Eye is a block that can be placed in any direction and underwater.$(br)$(li)When any entity, except $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/paintings)Paintings$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:decoration/quark/item_frame)Item Frames$(/l) is within 15 blocks of where it is facing, it will create a strong redstone signal from all sides.
$(li)You can toggle the Elder Eye on or off right clicking on it.$(br)$(li)It can only be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:bosses/elder_guardian)Elder Guardian$(/l).
